005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010
011import java.util.UUID;
012
013import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
014
015public interface IUuidItem extends IStringItem {
016
017  /**
018   * Construct a new item using the provided {@code value}.
019   *
020   * @param value
021   *          a UUID value
022   * @return the new item
023   */
024  @NonNull
025  static IUuidItem valueOf(@NonNull UUID value) {
026    return new UuidItemImpl(value);
027  }
028
029  /**
030   * Generate a random UUID value.
031   *
032   * @return the generated UUID item
033   */
034  @SuppressWarnings("null")
035  @NonNull
036  static IUuidItem random() {
037    return valueOf(UUID.randomUUID());
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
042   *
043   * @param item
044   *          the item to cast
045   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
046   *         cast to this type
047   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
048   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
049   */
050  @NonNull
051  static IUuidItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
052    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.UUID.cast(item);
053  }
054
055  /**
056   * Get the "wrapped" UUID value.
057   *
058   * @return the underlying UUID value
059   */
060  @NonNull
061  UUID asUuid();
062
063  @Override
064  default IUuidItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
065    return cast(item);
066  }
067
068  /**
069   * Compares this value with the argument.
070   *
071   * @param item
072   *          the item to compare with this value
073   * @return a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer if this value is less
074   *         than, equal to, or greater than the {@code item}.
075   */
076  default int compareTo(@NonNull IUuidItem item) {
077    return asUuid().compareTo(item.asUuid());
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem other) {
082    return compareTo(other.asStringItem());
083  }
084}
